content: * **Follow the golden path**. If you're not sure where you're going at any point, when you're close to a shrine, a golden trail will appear. This will take you to the nearest Keeper's Shrine, so let the light lead the way.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Essential_Tips_and_Tricks.md', within the main section titled 'Essential Tips and Tricks', specifically from the subsection 'Exploration Tips'.
The content is as follows:
* **Follow the golden path**. If you're not sure where you're going at any point, when you're close to a shrine, a golden trail will appear. This will take you to the nearest Keeper's Shrine, so let the light lead the way.
